title: Excel4apps Appoints Richard Sampson as Managing Director of UK and Europe Region

Thu, Sep 3, 2015, 10:55 BST - UK Markets close in 5 hrs 35 mins Excel4apps Appoints Richard Sampson as Managing Director of UK and Europe Region Press Release : Excel4apps – 17 minutes ago Print 
LONDON--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Sampson to head expanding regional team focused on delivery of software that expedites reporting and budgeting for Oracle and SAP users 
Excel4apps , a provider of best-in-class Excel-based inquiry and reporting software for use with SAP and Oracle, has announced the appointment of Richard Sampson as Managing Director of its UK and Europe region. Sampson’s appointment reflects the tremendous growth of Excel4apps, as evidenced by its recent award in the Fastest-Growing Company of the Year category in Best in Biz Awards 2015 International. 
“Richard brings rich IT sales development experience, and we are delighted to welcome him as leader of our UK and Europe team, which has expanded to meet growing demand for our products,” said Chris Meyer, President, Americas and Europe, for Excel4apps. “Richard’s expertise in enterprise systems, combined with our new regional Solution Specialists, will help customers recognise the benefits of real-time access to ERP data with products like GL Wand, Reports Wand and Budget Wand.” 
Sampson holds a B.A. in Economics from the University of Sheffield. He has almost 20 years of experience in software sales and business development, including positions such as Sales Director for Dassault Systemes, Head of EMEA Sales at Thomson Reuters, and Global Sales Director at NetNames. As Managing Director for Excel4apps, Sampson anticipates helping UK and European customers streamline reporting and budgeting processes from their ERP systems. 
“I’m excited to join Excel4apps at a key stage in its growth,” said Sampson. “Our growing European team will build on the principles for which Excel4apps is globally renowned: user-friendly products deployed by leading international finance teams; superior customer support; and world class software development to keep our solutions at the heart of customer reporting processes.” 
For more information about Excel4apps and its products, visit here . 
About Excel4apps 
Excel4apps is a best-in-class provider of Excel-based reporting and budget-loading software for Oracle and SAP. Designed for financial professionals, the award-winning GL Wand, Reports Wand, and Budget Wand products easily and securely deliver real-time ERP data using Microsoft Excel to save reporting time and effort. Excel4apps serves over 23,000 Oracle and SAP users worldwide, with offices in the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, United Arab Emirates, Hong Kong, Philippines and South Africa.
